website_summaries.verdict: A gorgeous, handcrafted wooden table with open shelves.
pros: This solid wood table has a beautiful finish that brings out the grain well
An ideal choice for a TV stand or hallway piece
Measures 47.5 inches wide by 16 inches deep by 30 inches high
cons: A bit on the higher end of the price spectrum

customer_reviews.title: Love the quality
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality. It seems like a piece you'd receive from a decent furniture store. Assembly was OK, I did struggle at first with installing some of the pieces backwards but either I was tired or that particular picture was confusing. Overall great looking product.
customer_reviews.author: Deon W.

customer_reviews.title: The end product looks good, I gave it 4 stars because of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Just as other reviews have stated, this product was ridiculously complicated to put together; and that was with two of us. The directions were extremely vague- it took about 5 hours from start to finish and lots of frustration. The end product looks good, I gave it 4 stars because of the quality and value for your buck. Good luck putting it together. If I had to do it again, I would pay a little extra to have it assembled (and I've assembled many, many things before- from ikea to furniture I've bought online).
customer_reviews.author: Lucy.R

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice Table
customer_reviews.text: For the money, this is a really nice console and side table. The console table puts my TV at just the right height. We did have some difficulty figuring out how to put it together at the beginning, but once we got the right piece attach, the rest just fell into place. It did have a broken piece, but I was able to glue it back into place. It was wrapped and boxed really well, so I was surprised that a part of the top was broken off (the trim underneath). Despite that, I would recommend this product. It looks great in our room!!
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Not Easy But Worth the Effort
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I've put together a number of pieces since I moved into this apartment and the instructions for this particular piece need improvement. I found them very confusing and this is not an easy assembly in my opinion. BUT that being said, once it's put together it is really nice and sturdy. I do love it. It's a great addition and improvemt to my living room.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great product!
customer_reviews.text: For the price of this console or sofa table it can't be beat. Parts went together pretty easy. Everything was included to make. Directions were pretty easy to follow and in the end I loved it. I did change the knobs just becausr i was looking for something a little different. It sits in my entryway and is perfect. Love the wood color!
customer_reviews.author: pammie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece, however the top piece is completely broken
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece, however the top piece is completely broken. I am awaiting a replacement top piece from the manufacturer and will update my review based on the quality and speed of their customer service. UPDATE 4/15/17 The company sent me a replacement top. The issue now is that it's very complicated to assemble. Had I known, I wouldn't have purchased. Looks nice, though.
customer_reviews.author: H. White

customer_reviews.title: ... a decorative piece/small amount of storage for random things like card games
customer_reviews.text: This table is exactly what I had wanted to place against an empty wall area in my living room and as a decorative piece/small amount of storage for random things like card games. The wood seems to be solid on most of the pieces except for maybe the doors and the back piece behind the cabinets. 4 out of 5 stars because it was a little tricky and confusing to put together; the directions could have been better.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased Console table
customer_reviews.text: This is very nice console table. Sturdy and looks beautiful behind our couch. Although the color is much darker than what is shown in the product description, it is still a very rich dark coffee brown color that looks great with any decor. It was a bit of a hassle to put together as most of the "pre-drilled" holes were to small and shallow to work properly. We had to re-drill most of the holes, but all in all...not a big deal. It is definitely a 2 person job. A good buy and a lovely finished product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loving this console
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED this until I noticed the wood cracked in two spots! From the left side for about 8 inches. It was over my heater vent, so may be my fault! Still love the console and its completely useable! Nice, heavy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Swarocks

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of furniture!
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a simple, decorative piece for under our wall-mounted TV. It is the perfect height, as we didn't want anything too big and bulky. Good quality solid wood. It was easy to put together and a fraction of the cost of a traditional TV stand.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Wish I didn’t get a broken part
customer_reviews.text: Directions are easy to follow and looks nice when put together. Only issue is that the top piece came broken upon arrival. This would have been less of an issue but this it the top piece that is facing outwards.
customer_reviews.author: Rubyat

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful quality at the best price!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for a console table. The color matches my other furniture and I love the design! Such a great price for the quality of this product. The only thing I wish was different are the cubbies. They would be more useful as drawers, plus easier to childproof. But other than that this is perfect for my little home and the amount of storage is awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: Lex Mix

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: i love the table it looks so good, and the price was not bad, the material is actually real wood!!!!! color finish is spectacular.only bad thing was the instructions arent very clear or not very easy to figure out took me 1.5 hours to build with 3 people
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Rivero

customer_reviews.title: Solid Wood Construction, Assembly can be tricky
customer_reviews.text: Great piece 100% solid wood no compressed or veneer surfaces. I did have some trouble with assembly of the legs. The trick seems to be in how far you screw in the locking anchor bolts. There is no clear point to stop. Go to little the legs won't go flush, Screw in to much and the lock will break when you tighten it. The locks typically make a click noise when you have turned it completely. These ones don't they just break if you over torque it. Luckily they include 2 extras (must be common) as I used them all.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole and Matt Rock

customer_reviews.title: Solid, attractive piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: Nice piece of furniture. Easy to assemble, solid, and attractive. Specs were exactly as given. I only didn't rate it 5 stars because it came damaged (back part of it has a Crack that I needed to wood glue back in place). Packing and shipping needs to be more careful.
customer_reviews.author: Emmalyth

customer_reviews.title: Unclear and difficult instructions make it incredibly difficult to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Really unhappy with the directions for assembly. It was incredibly unclear at several of the steps and I've ended up with a console with no doors because of it. I would recommend just going to Ikea because they at least make home assembly manageable and easy. Waste of my time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Mosconi

customer_reviews.title: Cheapest wood quality
customer_reviews.text: The table is made from very cheap quality wood, which was not treated properly before making the furniture out of it. The top of the table is made from small pieces of woods joined together. In less than a month's time all the joins on the top of the table stared opening up and gaps are visible all over the table (see picture). Even the woods started bending on it's own making the top of the table undulating. I would definitely not recommend anyone to buy this specific item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great table once you figure out how to put it ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great table once you figure out how to put it together. It was a bit confusing with the pictorial and took me a while to assemble once I figured it out. It's doable for one person. Two could have made go a bit faster. I use it as a table next to my desk to make an L-cove. Looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M Aquino

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but putting together is tricky
customer_reviews.text: this is really nice when you figure out how to put it together. There were a few extra pieces of hardware and the holes are drilled slightly off on the underside of the bottom shelf. You can't see it and it's easily fixed. Nice wood, solid piece. I would recommend it. I'm satisfied quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cayoyo

customer_reviews.title: Great product @ good price = #happy
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was quick. The package arrived in good condition. Assembly was reasonable although the directions were not the best. It looks sturdy and will fit in our hallway just fine. I like it and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Flandreau

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Great table! Looks wonderful and is sturdy. The color is a little darker than I expected but no big deal for me. Pretty difficult to put together (had to call my husband in for help) but what furniture isn't hard to put together when it has many pieces? Very happy with this purchase and looks great in our entry.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great piece!! Well packaged! Looks great and worth more. Great price and I'm very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Girard

customer_reviews.title: Cute, smaller than expected, but nice finish- difficult to put togethe
customer_reviews.text: The finishes are nice and I only purchased a new knob to match my pottery barn furniture. I like it, but it was so difficult to put together. Be very careful when you first get started, the directions doesn't really explain very well. The areas are very tight to use the Allen wrench so having your own tools would be really helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful console table and matches my family room decor perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful console table and matches my family room decor perfectly! The price was very affordable and it was easy to assemble. I would definitely recommend this product to anyone that would like to add a high quality look to their living space.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Tobin

customer_reviews.title: Assembling required
customer_reviews.text: The product is very nice except I did not receive any assembling instructions when I got it. Please, send me the instructions!
customer_reviews.author: Dusty Roads

customer_reviews.title: the table it self is beautiful if it wasn’t for the scratches in front
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was ok yet arrived scratched! I took photos and lost photos ... the table it self is beautiful if it wasn’t for the scratches in front.. my husband had to fix with wood marker
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: more like $70.
customer_reviews.text: Direction pictures are unclear. Pre-punched holes are misaligned. Interior shelves are two short and the screws can only go in one side, if you put them on the other side they are too close to edge and will split the wood. Doors will not stay straight and will not engage the magnets properly. Not worth the $130 I paid for it, more like $70.
customer_reviews.author: TD The Rockstar

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, but difficult to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this table looks in my front entry way, but it was very difficult to assemble. Two of the boards did not have holes drilled for the screws. Luckily, my boyfriend has a drill and made his own holes. Also, one of the doors does not fit properly and we have to gently lift it up and pull out to open it. Maybe in time this will adjust itself as it wears down but for now it is annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Hartwig

customer_reviews.title: Love the 2 drawers to hide stuff in so that ...
customer_reviews.text: Matches our living room set perfectly. Love the 2 drawers to hide stuff in so that the top stays clear of clutter. Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Snorman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, sturdy and quick to assemble. Very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: machinebreaker

customer_reviews.title: but very nice final result
customer_reviews.text: Was ridiculously hard to put together, but very nice final result.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Quality product for a nice price. A good looking piece also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love that it has space behind 2 doors as well ...
customer_reviews.text: We got this for the hallway by our front door. I love that it has space behind 2 doors as well as open shelves. It looks very nice, the size is perfect for what we need & it seems sturdy. I thought we might have to use a shim to keep it from wobbling but that wasn't the case. After spending a lot of time looking for an item like this, I'm completely happy with this purchase. Advice: You definitely need 2 people to put it together as instructed. Don't try to do it alone because someone needs to hold pieces together while you attach them.
customer_reviews.author: Sprout Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Looks solid. Not too much of a hassle to assemble. Took an hour or so.
customer_reviews.author: Elliott Turner

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I was a little apprehensive about ordering this due to the relatively low price. It arrived today, and I am very happy. It realistically takes two people to assemble, but it's well made and looks beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Frank C. Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Not happy!!
customer_reviews.text: After almost three months a huge crack has appeared on the top. We do not put anything heavy etc on it. Not happy!!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Solid, beautiful piece.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. Just what I wanted. Much darker/richer than how it looks in the pics. Very solid piece!
customer_reviews.author: Tori Stamps

customer_reviews.title: These shelves are awesome! Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These shelves are awesome! Sturdy, holds a ton of stuff! Great value for price! I liked them so well I bought a second one!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Perdue

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: This piece is very nice and made of real wood. Only reason for 4 rating is due to assembly being difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: ... quality of wood predrilled holes and alignment is very poor.
customer_reviews.text: So so quality of wood predrilled holes and alignment is very poor.
customer_reviews.author: ddeininger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great table assembly a little confusing and first one arrived damaged but was promptly replace. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: jean tobin

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, took about an 1 hr and half to put together by one person.
customer_reviews.author: LSNY

customer_reviews.title: Fit nicely where I placed it
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. Fit nicely where I placed it.
customer_reviews.author: lynn slevin

customer_reviews.title: love it perfect shape when I received it
customer_reviews.text: love it perfect shape when I received it. Directions a little difficult at first then got easier as I progressed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Liked the product hate the assembly
customer_reviews.text: It was a pain to put together and the instructions left much to the imagination. I do like the product itself, the quality for the price is unbeatable.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Nave

customer_reviews.title: Great color!
customer_reviews.text: Really liked the dark grained color of the table. Instructions of the build of the table were ok - but took a couple minutes to figure out which way things were actually going together. Overall give it high marks because it is a great piece of furniture when assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buffet table
customer_reviews.text: it was what we asked for but if it was a little taller it would have been even better!!
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Wood table, Axwell3-002
customer_reviews.text: Product was delivered on time. Took about 45 minutes to assemble. Only complaint is the table top had one small nick (about the size of a pencil eraser) in the wood when delivered.
customer_reviews.author: ryan james

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Table is very nice, good color. Labor intensive to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very Happy with it!! Found it to match description perfectly.

customer_reviews.title: Cancer furniture
customer_reviews.text: Got done putting it together and the last piece has the cancer sticker on it!! Why is this not in the description? There is no way I’m taking this apart but I don’t want a known carcinogen in my house with my family
customer_reviews.author: Thatonebitch

customer_reviews.title: Good price but so so quality.
customer_reviews.text: Looks good with good price. But when you look closer, low quality of wood and finish can be seen clearly. Scratches can be seen in some areas.
customer_reviews.author: Sukit Tretriluxana

customer_reviews.title: Broken Item, WRECKED!
customer_reviews.text: See reviews below. Item came in a box that looked like it had fallen off the back of a truck. Do to low quality of the materials it was broken in 3 places. And the alignment was off on the hinges due to there poor assembly to start with. I never leave reviews but this deserved one! Not a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Crosby

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: BAD INSTRUCTION. TOOK MY HUSBAND 2 hrs to put them together
customer_reviews.author: Suki Lah

product_meta.title: Simpli Home Acadian SOLID WOOD 48 inch Wide Rustic Console Sofa Table in Tobacco Brown
product_meta.description: An accent table worth repeating behind a sofa or in an entryway? Sure, why not…look no further. The Acadian Console Table features open shelves plus two large doors providing ample storage space. From the living room, family room to the entryway, this Console Table is a great way to gain storage in almost any room in your home...you choose which one! Rustic, contemporary design includes tapered legs, grooved sides and Brushed Nickel rounded square knobs. Assembly Required
feature_bullets: DIMENSIONS: 16" D x 47.5" W x 30" H
SOLID WOOD: Handcrafted with care using the finest quality Pine
HAND FINISED with a Dark Tobacco Brown stain and a protective NC lacquer to accentuate and highlight the grain and the uniqueness of each piece of furniture.

MULTIPURPOSE TABLE provides a place to display decorative items or store items that need to be easily accessed. Adds function and style without overwhelming the space. Looks great in your living room, family room, entryway, bedroom, condo or den.
Features two central doors with grooved panels that open to two cubby storage compartments and four open shelves for plenty of storage

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars80 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
